priceSync.title: Securities Price Sync
priceSync.description: Manually trigger price synchronization for all securities with holdings

notifications.adminRequired: Admin privileges required for this action

priceUpload.title: Manual Security Price Upload
priceUpload.description: Upload historical price data for securities via CSV or JSON files

dateRangeInfo.title: Available Exchange Rates Date Range ({currency}):
dateRangeInfo.tooltipText: You can upload security prices only for dates for which we have exchange rates available. Otherwise it won't be possible to convert security price to other currencies. If you need older data, upload exchange rates first. Otherwise depending on which option you will chose on the next steps records will be auto-filtered (omitted) or uploading request will fail.

fileUpload.title: Upload File
fileUpload.dragText: Click to upload or drag and drop

errors.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please upload CSV or JSON file.

fieldMapper.title: Map Fields
fieldMapper.description: Match your file's fields to the required fields below.
fieldMapper.dateFormatDescription: Select the date format used in your file
fieldMapper.mappingIncomplete: Please map all required fields to continue

preview.title: Data Preview
preview.recordsCount: {count} record will be uploaded | {count} records will be uploaded

warnings.differencesDetails: {count} record has a price difference greater than 4% compared to existing data. Please review carefully. | {count} records have a price difference greater than 4% compared to existing data. Please review carefully.

preview.filterCheckbox: Show only records with significant differences (>4%)
preview.noDifferences: No records with significant differences found.

autoFilter.title: Auto-filter dates outside available range
autoFilter.description: Automatically remove dates that are outside the available exchange rate range

override.title: Override existing records
override.description: Update existing price records instead of skipping duplicates

result.title: Upload Complete!
result.inserted: ✓ {count} new record inserted | ✓ {count} new records inserted
result.filtered: • {count} date filtered (outside range) | • {count} dates filtered (outside range)

notifications.uploadSuccess: Successfully uploaded {count} price record | Successfully uploaded {count} price records
